transcript.title: PM 77/1962 - Message to India
transcript.content:
PM No 77/1962
TheÂ Prime Minister has sent the followingÂ message to Mr. Nehiru thirough the AustralianÂ HighÂ Commission in New Delhi

"'We would like you to knowÂ ofÂ our sympathy and support in the difficultÂ situation on your northiern frontiers.Â TheÂ Australian Government has the greatest Â respect for the independent and courageousstand which the Indian Government and people are taking in the face of new acts of provocation threatening Indian territorial integrity. "

CANBERRA

28thÂ Â October, 1962.
